meta.title: Live Events Power Solutions | Humble
meta.description: Clean, quiet power for concerts, festivals, markets, and outdoor events. Battery-powered solutions for event organizers and venues.

hero.title: Clean Power for Concerts, Festivals, and Outdoor Events
hero.description: Battery-powered solutions for stages, sound systems, lighting, and vendor operations. Zero emissions, zero noise, professional event support.

items.title: For Maintenance & Operations
items.description: Portable 3 kW units sized for power tools, jackhammers, pumps, and mobile workstations. Overnight charging in the yard via standard 20A circuits or solar canopy.

items.title: City-Owned or Managed
items.description: Option A: City purchases units, vendor provides monitoring and analytics. Option B: Fully managed fleet with uptime SLA and maintenance included.

items.title: Built for Daily Use
items.description: Designed for cycle life and field abuse. LiFePO₄ chemistry for safety in enclosed spaces. GPS tracking and geofencing to prevent loss or misuse.

items.title: Farmers Markets & Street Vendor Power
items.description: City-managed battery fleet replaces vendor-owned generators. Two models: city check-out system or vendor drop-off/pickup each market day. 4-6 hour runtime for lights, freezers, and food prep. Behavior-change support to transition vendors off generators permanently.

items.title: City-Sponsored Events & Festivals
items.description: From single-stage concerts to multi-block open streets. City designates single battery provider during pilot; event organizers contact vendor directly. Delivery, setup, on-site support, teardown included. Stages, sound, lighting, food vendors, security infrastructure – all powered quietly.

items.title: Park Rentals & Bounce Houses
items.description: Emission-free power for bounce house blowers and party equipment. 4+ hour runtime with multi-battery configurations for full-day events. Vendor works with city-approved jumper suppliers and park permit process. Keep kids' parties quiet and fume-free.

items.title: Emergency & Resilience (Future)
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Not part of initial pilot, but batteries can support resilience planning with separate grants. Shows awareness of broader applications without over-promising.]
